attributes.action: Abolish daylight saving changes. Keep British Summer Time of GMT +1 year round.
attributes.additional_details: It helps the households in this energy crisis and it is a sustainable measure for the environment in the long term.
attributes.background: Pass a law to end the daylight saving changes. Keep British Summer Time of GMT +1 year round.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642905
